verses.verse: You shall not raise<WH5375> a false<WH7723> report:<WH8088> put<WH7896> not your hand<WH3027> with the wicked<WH7563> to be an unrighteous<WH2555> witness.<WH5707>

You shall not follow<WH1961> <WH310> a multitude<WH7227> to do evil;<WH7451> neither<WH3808> shall you speak<WH6030> in a cause<WH7379> to decline<WH5186> after<WH310> many<WH7227> to wrest<WH5186> judgment:
Neither<WH3808> shall you countenance<WH1921> a poor<WH1800> man in his cause.<WH7379>
If<WH3588> you meet<WH6293> your enemy's<WH341> ox<WH7794> or<WH176> his ass<WH2543> going<WH8582> astray,<WH8582> you shall surely bring<WH7725> it back<WH7725> to him again.<WH7725>

If<WH3588> you see<WH7200> the ass<WH2543> of him that hates<WH8130> you lying<WH7257> under<WH8478> his burden,<WH4853> and would forbear<WH2308> to help<WH5800> him, you shall surely help<WH5800> with him.
You shall not wrest<WH5186> the judgment<WH4941> of your poor<WH34> in his cause.<WH7379>
Keep<WH7368> you far<WH7368> from a false<WH8267> matter;<WH1697> and the innocent<WH5355> and righteous<WH6662> slay<WH2026> you not: for I will not justify<WH6663> the wicked.<WH7563>
And you shall take<WH3947> no<WH3808> gift:<WH7810> for the gift<WH7810> blinds<WH5786> the wise,<WH6493> and perverts<WH5557> the words<WH1697> of the righteous.<WH6662>
Also you shall not oppress<WH3905> a stranger:<WH1616> for you know<WH3045> the heart<WH5315> of a stranger,<WH1616> seeing<WH3588> you were strangers<WH1616> in the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
And six<WH8337> years<WH8141> you shall sow<WH2232> your land,<WH776> and shall gather<WH622> in the fruits<WH8393> thereof:

But the seventh<WH7637> year you shall let it rest<WH8058> and lie<WH5203> still; that the poor<WH34> of your people<WH5971> may eat:<WH398> and what they leave<WH3499> the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> shall eat.<WH398> In like<WH3651> manner<WH3651> you shall deal<WH6213> with your vineyard,<WH3754> and with your olive grove.<WH2132>

Six<WH8337> days<WH3117> you shall do<WH6213> your work,<WH4639> and on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> you shall rest:<WH7673> that your ox<WH7794> and your ass<WH2543> may rest,<WH5117> and the son<WH1121> of your handmaid,<WH519> and the stranger,<WH1616> may be refreshed.<WH5314>

And in all<WH3605> things that I have said<WH559> to you be circumspect:<WH8104> and make no<WH3808> mention<WH2142> of the name<WH8034> of other<WH312> gods,<WH430> neither<WH3808> let it be heard<WH8085> out of your mouth.<WH6310>
Three<WH7969> times you shall keep<WH2287> a feast<WH2287> to me in the year.<WH8141>

You shall keep<WH8104> the feast<WH2282> of unleavened<WH4682> bread: (you shall eat<WH398> unleavened<WH4682> bread seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> as I commanded<WH6680> you, in the time appointed<WH4150> of the month<WH2320> Abib;<WH24> for in it you came<WH3318> out from Egypt:<WH4714> and none<WH3808> shall appear<WH7200> before<WH6440> me empty:<WH7387>)

And the feast<WH2282> of harvest,<WH7105> the first fruits<WH1061> of your labors,<WH4639> which<WH834> you have sown<WH2232> in the field:<WH7704> and the feast<WH2282> of ingathering,<WH614> which is in the end<WH3318> of the year,<WH8141> when you have gathered<WH622> in your labors<WH4639> out of the field.<WH7704>
Three<WH7969> times<WH6471> in the year<WH8141> all<WH3605> your males<WH2138> shall appear<WH7200> before<WH413> <WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> God.<WH3068>

You shall not offer<WH2076> the blood<WH1818> of my sacrifice<WH2077> with leavened<WH2557> bread; neither<WH3808> shall the fat<WH2459> of my sacrifice<WH2282> remain<WH3885> until<WH5704> the morning.<WH1242>

The first<WH7225> of the first fruits<WH1061> of your land<WH127> you shall bring<WH935> into the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430> You shall not seethe<WH1310> a kid<WH1423> in his mother's<WH517> milk.<WH2461>

Behold,<WH2009> I send<WH7971> an Angel<WH4397> before<WH413> <WH6440> you, to keep<WH8104> you in the way,<WH1870> and to bring<WH935> you into<WH413> the place<WH4725> which<WH834> I have prepared.<WH3559>
Beware<WH8104> of him, and obey<WH8085> his voice,<WH6963> provoke<WH4843> him not; for he will not pardon<WH5375> your transgressions:<WH6588> for my name<WH8034> is in him.

But if<WH518> you shall indeed obey<WH8085> his voice,<WH6963> and do<WH6213> all<WH3605> that I speak;<WH1696> then I will be an enemy<WH340> to your enemies,<WH341> and an adversary<WH6887> to your adversaries.<WH6696>

For my Angel<WH4397> shall go<WH3212> before<WH413> <WH6440> you, and bring<WH935> you in to the Amorites,<WH567> and the Hittites,<WH2850> and the Perizzites,<WH6522> and the Canaanites,<WH3669> the Hivites,<WH2340> and the Jebusites:<WH2983> and I will cut<WH3582> them off.

You shall not bow<WH7812> down<WH7812> to their gods,<WH430> nor<WH3808> serve<WH5647> them, nor<WH3808> do<WH6213> after their works:<WH4639> but you shall utterly overthrow<WH2040> them, and quite break<WH7665> down<WH7665> their images.<WH4676>

And you shall serve<WH5647> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and he shall bless<WH1288> your bread,<WH3899> and your water;<WH4325> and I will take<WH5493> sickness<WH4245> away from the middle<WH7130> of you.
There shall nothing<WH3808> cast<WH7921> their young, nor be barren,<WH6135> in your land:<WH776> the number<WH4557> of your days<WH3117> I will fulfill.<WH4390>

I will send<WH7971> my fear<WH367> before<WH413> <WH6440> you, and will destroy<WH2000> all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> to whom<WH834> you shall come,<WH935> and I will make<WH5414> all<WH3605> your enemies<WH341> turn their backs<WH6203> to you.
And I will send<WH7971> hornets<WH6880> before<WH413> <WH6440> you, which shall drive<WH1644> out the Hivite,<WH2340> the Canaanite,<WH3669> and the Hittite,<WH2850> from before<WH413> <WH6440> you.

I will not drive<WH1644> them out from before<WH413> <WH6440> you in one<WH259> year;<WH8141> lest<WH6435> the land<WH776> become<WH1961> desolate,<WH8077> and the beast<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> multiply<WH7227> against<WH5921> you.
By little<WH4592> and little<WH4592> I will drive<WH1644> them out from before<WH413> <WH6440> you, until<WH5704> you be increased,<WH6509> and inherit<WH5157> the land.<WH776>

And I will set<WH7896> your bounds<WH1366> from the Red<WH5488> sea<WH3220> even to the sea<WH3220> of the Philistines,<WH6430> and from the desert<WH4057> to the river:<WH5104> for I will deliver<WH5414> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> into your hand;<WH3027> and you shall drive<WH1644> them out before<WH413> <WH6440> you.
You shall make<WH3772> no<WH3808> covenant<WH1285> with them, nor with their gods.<WH430>
They shall not dwell<WH3427> in your land,<WH776> lest<WH6435> they make you sin<WH2398> against me: for if you serve<WH5647> their gods,<WH430> it will surely<WH3588> be a snare<WH4170> to you.
